name: KindMoney
description:
Hello! It's a game about money and the kindness of people

So you spawn, you get steps, and you need to go to the gold platform, but the way is not free. It's a game for 4 players.

To go there you'll need to pay at least 10000$ to unlock purple platforms

Platforms in the game:

  • Money platform
  • Homeless platform(you must give him money if you entered his platform, bc you are kind))
  • AbilityRewardPlatform(you'll receive one ability of 2: teleportation, or shield from wasting money)
  • QuestionPlatform(gives you a question, for the right answer you'll receive 1000$, or lose 250$)
  • MinigamePlatform(if you win the mini game by throwing ball in the basket you'll receive 1000$ or lose 250$
  • PurplePlatform(unlockable platform - to unlock it you must select it if you have 5000$)
  • GoldPlatform(whoever is here - he is a winner)

Controls:

  • Left mouse button to select platforms
  •  W A S D to rotate camera
  • mouse scroll to zoom camera

Also you can ask player for his money by clicking on his platform if you are near to it.
